name: Telegram Edit Guard Bot
description: A Telegram moderation bot that deletes all edited messages and warns users (warning auto-deletes). Includes /start with banner, owner info, support group & support channel.

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot API Token from @BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram user ID of the bot owner

OWNER_NAME.description: Name of the bot owner (shown in /start)

WARNING_DELETE_DELAY.description: Time in seconds after which warning message should be deleted
